verses.verse: And when I came <S%G2064><s%> to you, brethren, <S%G80><s%> I did not come <S%G2064><s%> with superiority <S%G5247><s%> of speech <S%G3056><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> proclaiming <S%G2605><s%> to you the testimony <S%G3142><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For I determined <S%G2919><s%> to know <S%G3609><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5100><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you except <S%G1508><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and Him crucified. <S%G4717><s%>
And I was with you in weakness <S%G769><s%> and in fear <S%G5401><s%> and in much <S%G4183><s%> trembling. <S%G5156><s%>

And my message <S%G3056><s%> and my preaching <S%G2782><s%> were not in persuasive <S%G3981><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> of wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> but in demonstration <S%G585><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and of power, <S%G1411><s%>
that your faith <S%G4102><s%> should not rest <S%G1510><s%> on the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> but on the power <S%G1411><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Yet <S%G1161><s%> we do speak <S%G2980><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who are mature; <S%G5046><s%> a wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> however, <S%G1161><s%> not of this <S%G3778><s%> age, <S%G165><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> of the rulers <S%G758><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> age, <S%G165><s%> who are passing <S%G2673><s%> away; <S%G2673><s%>

but we speak <S%G2980><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s wisdom <S%G4678><s%> in a mystery, <S%G3466><s%> the hidden <S%G613><s%> [wisdom,] which <S%G3739><s%> God predestined <S%G4309><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the ages <S%G165><s%> to our glory; <S%G1391><s%>

[the wisdom] which <S%G3739><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of the rulers <S%G758><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> age <S%G165><s%> has understood; <S%G1097><s%> for if <S%G1487><s%> they had understood <S%G1097><s%> it, they would not have crucified <S%G4717><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> of glory; <S%G1391><s%>

but just <S%G2531><s%> as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "Things which <S%G3739><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%> has not seen <S%G3708><s%> and ear <S%G3775><s%> has not heard, <S%G191><s%> And [which] have not entered <S%G305><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> All <S%G3745><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> has prepared <S%G2090><s%> for those <S%G3588><s%> who love <S%G25><s%> Him."

For to us God <S%G2316><s%> revealed <S%G601><s%> [them] through <S%G1223><s%> the Spirit; <S%G4151><s%> for the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> searches <S%G2045><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the depths <S%G899><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For who <S%G5101><s%> among men <S%G444><s%> knows <S%G3609><s%> the [thoughts] of a man <S%G444><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the man, <S%G444><s%> which is in him? Even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> the [thoughts] of God <S%G2316><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> knows <S%G1097><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> we have received, <S%G2983><s%> not the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> but the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is from God, <S%G2316><s%> that we might know <S%G3609><s%> the things <S%G5483><s%> freely <S%G5483><s%> given <S%G5483><s%> to us by God, <S%G2316><s%>

which <S%G3739><s%> things we also <S%G2532><s%> speak, <S%G2980><s%> not in words <S%G3056><s%> taught <S%G1318><s%> by human <S%G442><s%> wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> but in those taught <S%G1318><s%> by the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> combining <S%G4793><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> [thoughts] with spiritual <S%G4152><s%> [words.]

But a natural <S%G5591><s%> man <S%G444><s%> does not accept <S%G1209><s%> the things of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> for they are foolishness <S%G3472><s%> to him, and he cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> understand <S%G1097><s%> them, because <S%G3754><s%> they are spiritually <S%G4153><s%> appraised. <S%G350><s%>

But he who is spiritual <S%G4152><s%> appraises <S%G350><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> he himself <S%G846><s%> is appraised <S%G350><s%> by no <S%G3762><s%> man. <S%G3762><s%>

For who <S%G5101><s%> has known <S%G1097><s%> the mind <S%G3563><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> that he should instruct <S%G4822><s%> Him? But we have <S%G2192><s%> the mind <S%G3563><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
